attributes.action: Insist public departments responsibly inform the public on the pros and cons of computer games and stop scapegoating and scaremongering.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK Change4Life campaign explicitly links early death and young gamers because while children are gaming they are not getting any exercise. This is irresponsible, firstly because the premise is not necessary true playing the Nintendo Wii does involve exercise. Watching TV,  reading books, listening to music involve no psychical activity so by the premise of the advertisement are just as likely to cause death yet none of these things are mentioned. At the same time all the benefits of playing computer games are ignored. By doing this the government is failing to properly inform the public.
